Nightlight::

"Kenzo!" shouted nightlight when she saw hers friend in stasis.

Nightlight had walked towards the battlefield looking for other 
hurted maxis  when she saw at Wheeljack X carring at Kenzo.

"Is he in stasis, Jackie? " she said 







--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "Hey, it's my job." Wheeljack shrugs.  He carefully picks up the 
> injured Maximal, carrying him inside.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > "Thanks" Kenzo says wearily as he comes out of stasis lock.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > Jackie grimaces under his faceplate.  "What a mess."  Quickly 
he 
> sets 
> > > to work, repairing enough of the damage to make sure Kenzo 
> survives.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > > > Waspinator converted to beast mode and flew away.
> > > > 
> > > > "As you command royalty, to the colony!" Inferno blasted off 
> towards
> > > > the predicon base as well.  
> > > > 
> > > > Kenzo layed criticaly damaged on the ground in stasis lock.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Devilcat realizes that staying any longer could be 
> > > suicide.  "Rogues, 
> > > > > fall back!  Return to base!"
> > > > > 
> > > > > Gatara abandons her prey reluctantly and takes to the air.  
> Noir 
> > > > > quickly follows.  Riekan and Fury break away from their 
> > > engagements 
> > > > > and race after the others.  The five Rogues vanish into 
thin 
> air 
> > > as 
> > > > > their cloaking devices go to work.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Wheeljack-X shakes his head, glad the battle is over.  
Seeing 
> > > Kenzo 
> > > > > badly damaged, he forgets his own wounds and rushes over to 
> help 
> > > him.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Empath snarls and reverts to beast mode, prowling across 
the 
> > > > > battlefield toward the base.
